name: The Lost Orb
description:
This Orb is lost and without a name. Without a name an Orb can not sing. Luckily the player has arrived to give this lonely Orb a name and reunite it with its friends. 

The music and the world generate is all randomised based of the Orb name. 

Controls 

The Orb will follow the mouse when held. Or on Click

On Mobile, the Orb will follow your finger 

Background music - The Cynic Project / cynicmusic.com / pixelsphere.org
